h3_title: Captain Wise-Voice Boss Fight and Guide
content: Other times, it will create a sustained laser much faster, roving around you to slash upwards, and then create a trail of lightning strikes in a vertical line you'll need to quickly strafe to outpace.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Captain_Wise-Voice.md', within the main section titled 'Captain Wise-Voice', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Captain Wise-Voice' and the sub-subsection 'Captain Wise-Voice Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Other times, it will create a sustained laser much faster, roving around you to slash upwards, and then create a trail of lightning strikes in a vertical line you'll need to quickly strafe to outpace.
